title: Did Trump Tweet in 2009 That He Would ‘Never Let Thousands of Americans Die From a Pandemic’?
subtitle: Seems like there's a tweet for everything ... but that doesn't make it real.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump tweeted in November 2009 that "Obama's handling of this whole pandemic has been terrible!" and that he "would never let thousands of Americans die from a pandemic while in office."
